scripts.build: next build && node fix-paths.js && touch out/.nojekyll
scripts.deploy:ci: next build && node fix-paths.js && touch out/.nojekyll && gh-pages -d out

_DEPLOYMENT_DOCUMENTATION._WARNING: ⚠️ CRITICAL: Use ./deploy.sh instead of npm scripts ⚠️
_DEPLOYMENT_DOCUMENTATION._WORKING_METHOD: Verified Aug 25, 2025: ./deploy.sh deploys to 'live' branch using npx gh-pages -d out -b live
_DEPLOYMENT_DOCUMENTATION._SCRIPTS_NOTE: npm run deploy/deploy:ci may not work reliably - use ./deploy.sh
